title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new pdf emitter
OB: The display property of an item is set to 'none', but it doesn't take effect in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'Properties' view.
3. Set the 'display' property of the section to 'none'.
